meta.title: Radix Sort
meta.description: Exists to make checking state easier.

comparingSorts.question: This list is better sorted using radix sort than _.  Why?
answerChoices: The length of the maximum number is less than log(n), where n is the number of elements in the list.
This list consists of numbers rather than strings
The numbers in the list are all close in value to each other.
The numbers in the list all have the same number of digits.
The list is already partially sorted.
The length of the maximum number is the same as the number of elements in the list.
